Actions.Text: REFERRED TO RACING, GAMING AND WAGERING

Title: Relates to participation in games of bingo by minors
Summary: Permits participation in games of bingo by minors who are accompanied by an adult.
LawCode: Amd ยง486, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to participation in games of bingo by minors
